sense.gloss: initiation (into a society, group, etc.), baptism
one's first experience of something, baptism (by fire, etc.)
to wash, to cleanse, to rinse
to lave (e.g. shore), to wash over (e.g. deck), to sweep
detergent, cleanser, cleaning agent, washing material
washing one's hands, water (or basin, etc.) for washing one's hands
washing with cold water (without using soap, etc.)
washing one's hair, having a shampoo
washing place (e.g. for laundry or tableware)
place for washing oneself in a bathroom
washing a kimono (or futon, etc.) without taking it apart, laundering whole
wash basin, wash bowl (incl. portable bowl in a public bath)
water for rinsing sake cups (at a banquet, etc.)
exposure by washing away, washing out, washout
revealing the grain of cedar boards by washing and scrubbing
finding out (after an extensive search or investigation), discovery, seeking out, bringing to light
font of purifying water placed at the entrance of a shrine
to wash away, to rinse off
stomach pumping, gastric irrigation, gastric lavage, gastric suction, gastrolavage
to reveal by washing the surface, to expose by washing away dirt, earth, etc.
to discover (by investigation), to bring to light, to find out, to dig up
to wash off, to wash out
to examine closely, to check up on, to ferret out

sdata.j: ↑洗↑↓あら↓ったあと↑引↑↓ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓って↑形↑↓かたち↓にして。
sdata.e: Pull into shape after washing.

sdata.j: ↑最初↑↓さいしょ↓↑着↑↓き↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓してください。
sdata.e: Wash before first wearing.

sdata.j: まだ↑晴↑↓は↓れている↑間↑↓あいだ↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓をしなければなりません。
sdata.e: I have to do laundry while it's still sunny.

sdata.j: お↑手洗↑↓てあら↓いはどこですか。
sdata.e: Where is the bathroom?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑食事↑↓しょくじ↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑手↑↓て↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓いますか。
sdata.e: Do you wash your hands before meals?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓ってもらった↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
sdata.e: You had better have your car washed.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑皿↑↓さら↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓いさえすればよい。
sdata.e: All you have to do is wash the dish.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はまだ↑手↑↓て↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓っていませんね。
sdata.e: You haven't washed your hands yet, have you?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はただ↑皿↑↓さら↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓いさえすればいい。
sdata.e: All you have to do is wash the dishes.

sdata.j: しなければならないのは、↑皿洗↑↓さらあら↓いだけです。
sdata.e: All you have to do is wash the dishes.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はシャツを↑洗↑↓あら↓ったほうがいい。
sdata.e: You may as well wash your shirt.

sdata.j: ↑橋↑↓はし↓は↑大水↑↓おおみず↓で↑洗↑↓あら↓い↑流↑↓なが↓された。
sdata.e: The bridge was washed away by the flood.

sdata.j: ↑鬼↑↓おに↓の↑留守↑↓るす↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓。
sdata.e: When the cat is away, the mice will play.

sdata.j: ↑鬼↑↓おに↓の↑居↑↓い↓ぬ↑間↑↓ま↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓。
sdata.e: When the cat is away, the mice will play.

sdata.j: ↑顔↑↓かお↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓いなさい。
sdata.e: Wash your face.

sdata.j: ↑顔↑↓かお↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓いなさい、と↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: He told me to wash my face.

sdata.j: ↑手↑↓て↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓いなさい。
sdata.e: Wash up.

sdata.j: ↑顔↑↓かお↓と↑手↑↓て↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓いなさい。
sdata.e: Wash up.

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓へ↑行↑↓い↓く↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑顔↑↓かお↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓いなさい。
sdata.e: Wash your face before you go to school.

sdata.j: ↑課長↑↓かちょう↓の↑奥↑↓おく↓さん、↑今↑↓こん↓↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓なんだって。それで、↑鬼↑↓おに↓のいぬ↑間↑↓かん↓の↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓とばかり、↑毎日↑↓まいにち↓↑飲↑↓の↓み↑歩↑↓ある↓いているんだ。
sdata.e: I heard the manager's wife is on vacation. And, well, when the cat's away, the mice play. Now he's out partying every night.

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓で↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓すると↑色↑↓いろ↓がにじむ。
sdata.e: If you wash it at home, the color will run.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓もかも↑洗↑↓あら↓いざらい↑言↑↓い↓ってしまえ。
sdata.e: You had better tell me the whole story.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓とか↑息子↑↓むすこ↓に↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓わせよう。
sdata.e: I'll get my son to wash my car somehow or other.

sdata.j: ↑下↑↓した↓へ↑行↑↓い↓って↑顔↑↓かお↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓ってきなさい。
sdata.e: Go downstairs and have a wash.

sdata.j: ↑俺↑↓おれ↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓い↑清↑↓きよ↓めろ！↑俺↑↓おれ↓を↑解放↑↓かいほう↓しろ！↑俺↑↓おれ↓を↑自由↑↓じゆう↓にしろ！
sdata.e: Cleanse me! Release me! Set me free!

sdata.j: ↑汚↑↓よご↓れた↑食器↑↓しょっき↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓うのを↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓いましょうか。
sdata.e: Shall I help you with the washing-up?

sdata.j: ↑汚↑↓きたな↓い↑下着↑↓したぎ↓を↑人前↑↓ひとまえ↓で↑洗↑↓あら↓うな。
sdata.e: Don't wash your dirty linen in public.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓↑物↑↓ぶつ↓を↑取↑↓と↓り↑込↑↓こ↓もう。
sdata.e: I'll take in the washing before it rains.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓り↑出↑↓だ↓すと↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓↑物↑↓ぶつ↓を↑取↑↓と↓り↑込↑↓こ↓んだ。
sdata.e: She took in the washing when it started to rain.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓りはじめると、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑息子↑↓むすこ↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓↑物↑↓ぶつ↓を↑取↑↓と↓り↑込↑↓こ↓むように↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: When it began to rain, she told her son to take in the washing.
